descriptionMdByRank.1: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by **8%**. Increases Counter Attack DMG by **50%**, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by **5%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.2: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by **10%**. Increases Counter Attack DMG by **62.5%**, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by **6.25%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.3: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by **12%**. Increases Counter Attack DMG by **75%**, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by **7.5%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.4: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by **14%**. Increases Counter Attack DMG by **87.5%**, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by **8.75%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: When the Resonator dashes or dodges, increases ATK by **16%**. Increases Counter Attack DMG by **100%**, lasting for 8s. When Counter Attack is performed, restores the Resonator's HP by **10%**. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 6s.
